title: What If You Could Hear What Others Are Hearing?
description: Wearhaus Arc Headphones (USA Link) -  Wearhaus Arc Headphones (International) -   These wireless bluetooth headphones feature a unique ability to broadcast sounds to other wireless headphones.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
